**Release Date:** July18, 2020 **Record Label:** Solid State Records

**Genre:** Melodic Hardcore/Pop-punk **Album length:** 38 Minutes

1.Not the Same 2.No Regrets 3.Empty Roads 4.Above the Waves 5.Attention 6.Death to Life 7.Freedom 8.Black Friday 9.Iron Gates 10.Something to Give 11.Lives in Me 12.Memories 13.Drifting

* * *

Holding onto old plans, I never thought I’d see a second chance.

Now it stands right in front of me. So I’m running where you’re calling and trusting all you said.

To lose the things I shouldn’t bring, and keep my eyes ahead.

Wake up. Wake up. Night always turns to day.

Shadows that blocked your path will have to hide their face.

Look up. Look up. Don’t think about what’s been.

That past can’t hold you back from wanting to step in.

Why should we ever play it safe when something great is waiting past the break?

So I’ll keep my face above the waves. And all the time we take will not be for nothing.

Running into old friends reminds me of the days when I’d break down,

and start to drown every time it rained.

You gave my mind a new frame and gave me a new pace.

So even when the skies turned grey, I’d give you everything.

Wake up. Wake up. Night always turns to day.

Shadows that blocked your path will have to hide their face.

Look up. Look up. Don’t think about what’s been.

That past can’t hold you back from wanting to step in.

Why should we ever play it safe when something great is waiting past the break?

So I’ll keep my face above the waves. And all the time we take will not be for nothing.
